Hi,

Sorry for the delay in the response.

I removed the sample application and replaced with an empty template, because it was annoying to have to remove all the existing logic every time you wanted to create a new application.

Currently I am considering building a reference app to demo all aspects of the MVVM Light Toolkit. This will however take a little time...

Cheers,

Laurent

A sample app would be cool. There is always a lot you can learn from how smarter guys wire their code up. (and how everything was meant to be)

cu,
